name: coding-challenge-db
description: 1. Fork this repository into your own personal space on GitHub. 2. You might want to setup branch protection if you are working in a team so direct commits to main are restricted and then branches and pull requests/reviews are required for all team members: * In your repository navigation to Settings > Branches * Under “Protected Branches” select 'main' * Enable the following settings:   * Protect this branch   * Require pull request reviews before merging   * Dismiss stale pull request approvals when new commits are pushed   * Include administrators
